00022 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_TIMER_H
00023 #define HYPERTABLE_TIMER_H

00025 #include <cstring>
00026 
00027 #include <boost/thread/xtime.hpp>
00028 
00029 namespace Hypertable {
00030 
00033   class Timer {
00034   public:
00035 
00036     Timer(double value, bool start_timer=false) : m_running(false), m_remaining(value) { 
00037       if (start_timer)
00038         start();
00039     }
00040 
00041     void start() { 
00042       if (!m_running) {
00043         boost::xtime_get(&start_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00044         m_running = true;
00045       }
00046     }
00047 
00048     void stop() {
00049       boost::xtime stop_time;
00050       boost::xtime_get(&stop_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00051       if (start_time.sec == stop_time.sec)
00052         m_remaining -= (double)(stop_time.nsec - start_time.nsec) / 1000000000.0;
00053       else {
00054         m_remaining -= stop_time.sec - start_time.sec;
00055         m_remaining -= ((1000000000.0 - (double)start_time.nsec) + (double)stop_time.nsec) / 1000000000.0;
00056       }
00057       m_running = false;
00058     }
00059 
00060     double remaining() { 
00061       if (m_running) { stop(); start(); }
00062       return (m_remaining < 0.0) ? 0.0 : m_remaining;
00063     }
00064 
00065     bool expired() { return remaining() <= 0.0; }
00066 
00067     bool is_running() { return m_running; }
00068 
00069   private:
00070     bool m_running;
00071     boost::xtime start_time;
00072     double m_remaining;
00073   };
00074 
00075 }

00077 #endif // HYPERTABLE_TIMER_H
